history.wish: I wish i'm on the nice list
history.reason: Ho ho ho! A simple wish to be on the nice list is a very nice wish indeed! I'll make sure to double-check my records for you, Coropatsyy!

history.wish: I wish i'm on the bad list
history.reason: the elves tell me that coropatsyy wishes to be on the bad list! i can not fulfill this request as i can not change anyones opinions about you! "the bad list" is also rather vague of a wish. i will be putting you on the naughty list for this
